short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn Japanese with LangBuddy AI! Translate, kanji analysis and stroke diagrams, onyomi/kunyomi, furigana, romaji, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock your full potential to Learn Japanese with LangBuddy AI! This powerful Chrome extension seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience, enabling you to learn Japanese effortlessly on any website. Add functionlity to whatever learning app you use, whether it be Anki, WaniKani, Rosetta Stone, LangBuddy brings everything together in one place. 

With LangBuddy AI, you can:

Translate Text Instantly: Highlight any text and Kanji on a webpage to get immediate translations.
In-depth Kanji Breakdown and stroke diagram: Understand each kanji character with detailed breakdowns, including furigana and romanji.
Learn Synonyms: Discover synonyms for selected words and their nuanced differences.
Onyomi and Kunyomi Readings: Access onyomi and kunyomi readings for deeper comprehension.
Usage Examples: See how words are used in sentences with translations to enhance contextual learning.
Interactive Learning: Engage with additional information and learning aids without leaving the page.
Free and Premium Versions Available

Free Version: Access up to 5 AI responses per day along with Kanji Stroke Diagrams/meaning
Premium Subscription: Unlock unlimited AI responses and advanced features.
Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner, LangBuddy AI is designed to make learning Japanese more interactive, enjoyable, and efficient. Enhance your language skills directly within your browsing experience and take your Japanese proficiency to the next level!

Key Features:

No need to manually prompt the AI; just highlight the text and let LangBuddy AI do the rest.
Detailed kanji breakdowns with furigana and romanji for better understanding.
Kanji Stroke diagrams for writing assistance.
Synonym comparisons with explanations of differences.
Onyomi and Kunyomi readings for kanji characters.
Real-time usage examples in sentences with translations.
Easy to upgrade to premium for unlimited access and advanced features.
Install LangBuddy AI now and transform the way you StudyJapanese online!
